About

Oscorp is a fictional company from the Spiderverse. It's founder turned out to be the Green Goblin that for some reason became Spiderman's adversary. This is actually just some filler text that I'm inventing and I'm not really fact checking anything of it because it's not really that relevant. So this is not a very professional 'about' page, but it's just to test the nav-bar, making sure it tags along when the page scrolls.
